title: What is CS0103?
labels: All compiler errors have to be fixed

sections.title: Symptoms
content: You are seeing the following error in the console window:
error CS0103: The name `____' does not exist in the current context

sections.title: Cause
content: CS0103 is caused when you are using a name for a variable or method that does not exist within the context that you are using it.

error CS0103: The name `displayFirstName' does not exist in the current
context

sections.title: Resolution
content: In order to fix the CS0103 error you will need to correct the name of the variable or method from where it is declared or referenced.
